actions.name: Mind's Eye
actions.description:
Trigger: The user uses Foresight.
Effect: Connection - Foresight. The user's Normal and Fighting-Type attacks do not miss when attacking Ghost-Type creatures while affected by @Affliction[true-sight] granted by the triggering Foresight.

actions.name: Mind's Eye
actions.description: Passive: While the user is affected by @Affliction[true-sight], their Normal and Fighting-Type attacks deal Super Effective damage to Ghost-Type creatures.
